issue.title: [Rust] Implement math kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10020](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10020). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of these kernels are in DataFusion, and could be migrated to Rust.

 

Note that packed_simd has implementations for some of these operations with SIMD, which we could leverage.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10020?focusedCommentId=17332126) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/102
